<<<<<<< HEAD
This following is a copy of a letter I sent to George Fox, the 3d day of the month called August, 1671 only the words in the margent, and at the lower end I have added, who are required thus to publish it. Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
1 broadside.
[s.n.], London : Printed the 8th instant, 1671.
Signed: John Pennyman. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
This following is a copy of a letter I sent to George Fox, the 3d day of the month called August, 1671 only the words in the margent, and at the lower end I have added, who are required thus to publish it. Pennyman, John, 1628-1706.
1 broadside.
[s.n.], London : Printed the 8th instant, 1671.
Signed: John Pennyman. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
